例5.1

data chunhan;
input y$ x1 x2;
cards;
y1 24.8 -2.0
y1 24.7 -2.4
y1 26.6 -3.0
y1 23.5 -1.9
y1 25.5 -2.1
y1 27.4 -3.1
y2 22.1 -0.7
y2 21.6 -1.4
y2 22.0 -0.8
y2 22.8 -1.6 
y2 22.7 -1.5
y2 21.5 -1.0
y2 22.1 -1.2
y2 21.4 -1.3
;
proc discrim data=chunhan 
     out=a1 outstat=a2 
     outcross=a3 list all;
class y;
var x1 x2;
run;

例5.2 

data pjxf;
input y $ x1-x8;
cards;
y1 8.35 23.53 7.51 8.62 17.42 10.00 1.04 11.21
y1 9.25 23.75 6.61 9.19 17.77 10.48 1.72 10.51
y1 8.19 30.50 4.72 9.78 16.28 7.60 2.52 10.32
y1 7.73 29.20 5.42 9.43 19.29 8.49 2.52 10.32
y1 9.42 27.93 8.20 8.14 16.17 9.42 1.55 9.76
y1 9.16 27.98 9.01 9.32 15.99 9.10 1.82 11.35
y1 10.06 28.64 10.52 10.05 16.18 8.39 1.96 10.81
y1 9.09 28.12 7.40 9.62 17.26 11.12 2.49 12.65
y1 9.41 28.20 5.77 10.80 16.36 11.56 1.53 12.17
y1 8.70 28.12 7.21 10.53 19.45 13.30 1.66 11.96
y1 6.93 29.85 4.54 9.49 16.62 10.65 1.88 13.61
y1 8.67 36.05 7.31 7.75 16.67 11.68 2.38 12.88
y1 9.98 37.69 7.01 8.94 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 6.77 38.69 6.01 8.82 14.79 11.44 1.74 13.23
y1 8.14 37.75 9.61 8.49 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 7.67 35.71 8.04 8.31 15.13 7.76 1.41 13.25
y1 7.90 39.77 8.49 12.94 19.27 11.05 2.04 13.29
y1 7.18 40.91 7.32 8.94 17.60 12.75 1.14 14.80
y1 8.82 33.70 7.59 10.98 18.82 14.73 1.78 10.10
y1 6.25 35.02 4.72 6.28 10.03 7.15 1.93 10.39
y2 10.60 52.41 7.70 9.98 12.53 11.70 2.31 14.69
y2 7.72 52.65 3.84 9.16 13.03 15.26 1.98 14.57
y2 13.45 55.85 5.50 7.45 9.55 9.52 2.21 16.30
y2 10.85 44.68 7.32 14.51 17.13 12.08 1.26 11.57
y2 7.21 45.79 7.66 10.36 16.56 12.86 2.25 11.69
y2 7.68 50.37 11.35 13.30 19.25 14.59 2.75 14.87
y2 7.78 48.44 8.00 20.51 22.12 15.73 1.15 16.61
;
data pjxf1;
input x1-x8;
cards;
7.94 39.65 20.97 20.82 22.52 12.41 1.75 7.90
8.28 64.34 8.00 22.22 20.06 15.12 0.72 22.89
12.47 76.39 5.52 11.24 14.52 22.00 5.46 25.50
;
proc discrim data=pjxf 
     testdata=pjxf1 out=a1
     outstat=a2 outcross=a3
     testout=a4 method=normal
     list all crosslist testlist;
class y;
var x1-x8;
run;

例5.3
data shouru;
input y $ x1-x9;
cards;
y1 170.03 110.2 59.76 8.38 4.49 26.80 16.44 11.9 0.41
y1 141.55 82.58 50.98 13.4 9.33 21.30 12.36 9.21 1.05
y1 119.40 83.33 53.39 11.0 7.52 17.30 11.79 12.0 0.70
y1 194.53 107.8 60.24 15.6 8.88 31.00 21.01 11.8 0.16
y1 130.46 86.21 52.30 15.9 10.5 20.61 12.14 9.61 0.47
y1 119.29 85.41 53.02 13.1 8.44 13.87 16.47 8.38 0.51
y1 134.46 98.61 48.18 8.90 4.34 21.49 26.12 13.6 4.56
y1 143.79 99.97 45.60 6.30 1.56 18.67 29.49 11.8 3.82 
y1 128.05 74.96 50.13 13.9 9.62 16.14 10.18 14.5 1.21
y1 127.41 93.54 50.57 10.5 5.87 19.41 21.20 12.6 0.90
y1 122.96 101.4 69.70 6.30 3.86 11.30 18.96 5.62 4.62 
y2 102.49 71.72 47.72 9.42 6.96 13.12 7.90 6.66 0.61
y2 106.14 76.27 46.19 9.65 6.27 9.655 20.10 6.97 0.96
y2 104.93 72.99 44.60 13.7 9.01 9.435 20.61 6.65 1.68
y2 103.34 62.99 42.95 11.1 7.41 8.342 10.19 6.45 2.68
y2 98.089 69.45 43.04 11.4 7.95 10.59 16.50 7.69 1.08
y2 104.12 72.23 47.31 9.48 6.43 13.14 10.43 8.30 1.11
y2 108.49 80.79 47.52 6.06 3.42 13.69 16.53 8.37 2.85
y2 113.99 75.60 50.88 5.21 3.86 12.94 9.492 6.77 1.27 
y2 114.06 84.31 52.78 7.81 5.44 10.82 16.43 3.79 1.19 
y2 108.80 80.41 50.45 7.27 4.07 8.371 18.98 5.95 0.83
y2 115.96 88.21 51.85 8.81 5.63 13.95 22.65 4.75 0.97
y3 128.46 68.91 43.41 22.4 15.3 13.88 12.43 9.01 1.41
y3 135.24 73.18 44.54 23.9 15.2 22.38 9.661 13.9 1.19
y3 162.53 80.11 45.99 24.3 13.9 29.54 10.90 13.0 1.19 
y3 111.77 71.07 43.64 19.4 12.5 16.68 9.698 7.02 0.63
y3 139.09 79.09 44.19 18.5 10.5 20.23 16.47 7.67 3.08
y3 124.00 84.66 44.05 13.5 7.47 19.11 20.49 10.3 1.76
;

data shouru1;
input x1-x9;
cards;
211.30 114.0 41.44 33.2 11.2 48.72 30.77 14.9 11.1
175.93 163.8 57.89 4.22 3.37 17.81 82.32 15.7 0.00
;
proc discrim data=shouru
      testdata=shouru1 out=a1 outstat=a2
      outcross=a3 testout=a4 method=normal
      list all crosslist testlist;
class y;
var x1-x9;
run;

例5.4
data chunhan;
input y$ x1 x2;
cards;
y1 24.8 -2.0
y1 24.7 -2.4
y1 26.6 -3.0
y1 23.5 -1.9
y1 25.5 -2.1
y1 27.4 -3.1
y2 22.1 -0.7
y2 21.6 -1.4
y2 22.0 -0.8
y2 22.8 -1.6 
y2 22.7 -1.5
y2 21.5 -1.0
y2 22.1 -1.2
y2 21.4 -1.3
;
proc discrim data=chunhan 
     method=normal pool=no crosslist
     listerr crosslisterr outstat=a2 
     outcross=a3 list all;
class y;
var x1 x2;
priors prop;
run;

例5.5
data pjxf;
input y $ x1-x8;
cards;
y1 8.35 23.53 7.51 8.62 17.42 10.00 1.04 11.21
y1 9.25 23.75 6.61 9.19 17.77 10.48 1.72 10.51
y1 8.19 30.50 4.72 9.78 16.28 7.60 2.52 10.32
y1 7.73 29.20 5.42 9.43 19.29 8.49 2.52 10.32
y1 9.42 27.93 8.20 8.14 16.17 9.42 1.55 9.76
y1 9.16 27.98 9.01 9.32 15.99 9.10 1.82 11.35
y1 10.06 28.64 10.52 10.05 16.18 8.39 1.96 10.81
y1 9.09 28.12 7.40 9.62 17.26 11.12 2.49 12.65
y1 9.41 28.20 5.77 10.80 16.36 11.56 1.53 12.17
y1 8.70 28.12 7.21 10.53 19.45 13.30 1.66 11.96
y1 6.93 29.85 4.54 9.49 16.62 10.65 1.88 13.61
y1 8.67 36.05 7.31 7.75 16.67 11.68 2.38 12.88
y1 9.98 37.69 7.01 8.94 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 6.77 38.69 6.01 8.82 14.79 11.44 1.74 13.23
y1 8.14 37.75 9.61 8.49 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 7.67 35.71 8.04 8.31 15.13 7.76 1.41 13.25
y1 7.90 39.77 8.49 12.94 19.27 11.05 2.04 13.29
y1 7.18 40.91 7.32 8.94 17.60 12.75 1.14 14.80
y1 8.82 33.70 7.59 10.98 18.82 14.73 1.78 10.10
y1 6.25 35.02 4.72 6.28 10.03 7.15 1.93 10.39
y2 10.60 52.41 7.70 9.98 12.53 11.70 2.31 14.69
y2 7.72 52.65 3.84 9.16 13.03 15.26 1.98 14.57
y2 13.45 55.85 5.50 7.45 9.55 9.52 2.21 16.30
y2 10.85 44.68 7.32 14.51 17.13 12.08 1.26 11.57
y2 7.21 45.79 7.66 10.36 16.56 12.86 2.25 11.69
y2 7.68 50.37 11.35 13.30 19.25 14.59 2.75 14.87
y2 7.78 48.44 8.00 20.51 22.12 15.73 1.15 16.61
;
data pjxf1;
input x1-x8;
cards;
7.94 39.65 20.97 20.82 22.52 12.41 1.75 7.90
8.28 64.34 8.00 22.22 20.06 15.12 0.72 22.89
12.47 76.39 5.52 11.24 14.52 22.00 5.46 25.50
;
proc discrim data=pjxf 
     testdata=pjxf1 out=a1
     outstat=a2 outcross=a3
     testout=a4 method=normal
     list all crosslist testlist;
class y;
var x1-x8;
priors proportional;
run;

例5.6
data yuejunshouru;
input y $ x1-x9;
cards;
y1 170.03 110.2 59.76 8.38 4.49 26.80 16.44 11.9 0.41
y1 141.55 82.58 50.98 13.4 9.33 21.30 12.36 9.21 1.05
y1 119.40 83.33 53.39 11.0 7.52 17.30 11.79 12.0 0.70
y1 194.53 107.8 60.24 15.6 8.88 31.00 21.01 11.8 0.16
y1 130.46 86.21 52.30 15.9 10.5 20.61 12.14 9.61 0.47
y1 119.29 85.41 53.02 13.1 8.44 13.87 16.47 8.38 0.51
y1 134.46 98.61 48.18 8.90 4.34 21.49 26.12 13.6 4.56
y1 143.79 99.97 45.60 6.30 1.56 18.67 29.49 11.8 3.82 
y1 128.05 74.96 50.13 13.9 9.62 16.14 10.18 14.5 1.21
y1 127.41 93.54 50.57 10.5 5.87 19.41 21.20 12.6 0.90
y1 122.96 101.4 69.70 6.30 3.86 11.30 18.96 5.62 4.62 
y2 102.49 71.72 47.72 9.42 6.96 13.12 7.90 6.66 0.61
y2 106.14 76.27 46.19 9.65 6.27 9.655 20.10 6.97 0.96
y2 104.93 72.99 44.60 13.7 9.01 9.435 20.61 6.65 1.68
y2 103.34 62.99 42.95 11.1 7.41 8.342 10.19 6.45 2.68
y2 98.089 69.45 43.04 11.4 7.95 10.59 16.50 7.69 1.08
y2 104.12 72.23 47.31 9.48 6.43 13.14 10.43 8.30 1.11
y2 108.49 80.79 47.52 6.06 3.42 13.69 16.53 8.37 2.85
y2 113.99 75.60 50.88 5.21 3.86 12.94 9.492 6.77 1.27 
y2 114.06 84.31 52.78 7.81 5.44 10.82 16.43 3.79 1.19 
y2 108.80 80.41 50.45 7.27 4.07 8.371 18.98 5.95 0.83
y2 115.96 88.21 51.85 8.81 5.63 13.95 22.65 4.75 0.97
y3 128.46 68.91 43.41 22.4 15.3 13.88 12.43 9.01 1.41
y3 135.24 73.18 44.54 23.9 15.2 22.38 9.661 13.9 1.19
y3 162.53 80.11 45.99 24.3 13.9 29.54 10.90 13.0 1.19 
y3 111.77 71.07 43.64 19.4 12.5 16.68 9.698 7.02 0.63
y3 139.09 79.09 44.19 18.5 10.5 20.23 16.47 7.67 3.08
y3 124.00 84.66 44.05 13.5 7.47 19.11 20.49 10.3 1.76
;
data yuejunshouru1;
input x1-x9;
cards;
211.30 114.0 41.44 33.2 11.2 48.72 30.77 14.9 11.1
175.93 163.8 57.89 4.22 3.37 17.81 82.32 15.7 0.00
;
proc discrim data=yuejunshouru
      testdata=yuejunshouru1 out=a1 outstat=a2
      outcross=a3 testout=a4 method=normal
      list all crosslist crossvalidate testlist;
class y;
var x1-x9;     /*例5.7 改为var x2 x4 x5 x8;即可*/
priors prop;
run;
例5.7
上例中
 var x1-x9;
改为
 var x2 x4 x5 x8;
即可


例5.8

data d522;
  input group x1-x4 @@;
  cards;
1 228 134 20 11  1 245 134 10 40
1 200 167 12 27  1 170 150  7  8
1 100 167 20 14  2 225 125  7 14
2 130 100  6 12  2 150 117  7  6
2 120 133 10 26  2 160 100  5 10
3 185 115  5 19  3 170 125  6  4
3 165 142  5  3  3 135 108  2 12
3 100 117  7  2
;

proc discrim data=d522 list all;
class group;
var x2 x3;
run;


data d5222;
  input group x1-x4 @@;
  cards;
1 228 134 20 11  1 245 134 10 40
1 200 167 12 27  1 170 150  7  8
1 100 167 20 14  2 225 125  7 14
2 130 100  6 12  2 150 117  7  6
2 120 133 10 26  2 160 100  5 10
2 185 115  5 19  2 170 125  6  4
2 165 142  5  3  2 135 108  2 12
2 100 117  7  2
;
proc discrim data=d5222 list all;
class group;
var x2 x3;
run;/*以上检验各类之间的显著性*/


proc stepdisc data=d522;
   class group;
   var x1-x4;
run;

proc discrim data=d522 list all;
  class group;
  var x2 x3;
run;
quit;



例9
data pjxf;
input y $ x1-x8;
cards;
y1 8.35 23.53 7.51 8.62 17.42 10.00 1.04 11.21
y1 9.25 23.75 6.61 9.19 17.77 10.48 1.72 10.51
y1 8.19 30.50 4.72 9.78 16.28 7.60 2.52 10.32
y1 7.73 29.20 5.42 9.43 19.29 8.49 2.52 10.32
y1 9.42 27.93 8.20 8.14 16.17 9.42 1.55 9.76
y1 9.16 27.98 9.01 9.32 15.99 9.10 1.82 11.35
y1 10.06 28.64 10.52 10.05 16.18 8.39 1.96 10.81
y1 9.09 28.12 7.40 9.62 17.26 11.12 2.49 12.65
y1 9.41 28.20 5.77 10.80 16.36 11.56 1.53 12.17
y1 8.70 28.12 7.21 10.53 19.45 13.30 1.66 11.96
y1 6.93 29.85 4.54 9.49 16.62 10.65 1.88 13.61
y1 8.67 36.05 7.31 7.75 16.67 11.68 2.38 12.88
y1 9.98 37.69 7.01 8.94 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 6.77 38.69 6.01 8.82 14.79 11.44 1.74 13.23
y1 8.14 37.75 9.61 8.49 13.15 9.76 1.28 11.28
y1 7.67 35.71 8.04 8.31 15.13 7.76 1.41 13.25
y1 7.90 39.77 8.49 12.94 19.27 11.05 2.04 13.29
y1 7.18 40.91 7.32 8.94 17.60 12.75 1.14 14.80
y1 8.82 33.70 7.59 10.98 18.82 14.73 1.78 10.10
y1 6.25 35.02 4.72 6.28 10.03 7.15 1.93 10.39
y2 10.60 52.41 7.70 9.98 12.53 11.70 2.31 14.69
y2 7.72 52.65 3.84 9.16 13.03 15.26 1.98 14.57
y2 13.45 55.85 5.50 7.45 9.55 9.52 2.21 16.30
y2 10.85 44.68 7.32 14.51 17.13 12.08 1.26 11.57
y2 7.21 45.79 7.66 10.36 16.56 12.86 2.25 11.69
y2 7.68 50.37 11.35 13.30 19.25 14.59 2.75 14.87
y2 7.78 48.44 8.00 20.51 22.12 15.73 1.15 16.61
;
proc stepdisc data=pjxf method=stepwise all;/*逐步判别分析*/
class y;
var x1-x8;
run;

data pjxf1;
input x1-x8;
cards;
7.94 39.65 20.97 20.82 22.52 12.41 1.75 7.90
8.28 64.34 8.00 22.22 20.06 15.12 0.72 22.89
12.47 76.39 5.52 11.24 14.52 22.00 5.46 25.50
;
proc discrim data=pjxf                       /*检验逐步判别的好处*/
     testdata=pjxf1 
     list all crosslist testlist;
class y;
var x1 x2 x4;
priors prop;
run;
